## Tampa International Airport (TPA): An Overview

-   Location: Tampa, Florida
- 23rd Largest Airport in the U.S. 
- 21 million passengers, 459 million pieces of cargo, and 26 million pieces of mail in 2022 
- 60,000 passengers/day
- 550 departing and arriving flights/day (combined)
-   \>90 destinations
- Highest Traffic in March, Lowest in September
- Publicly owned by the Hillsborough County Aviation Authority (HCAA)

Sources: [@FactsStatisticsFinancials], [@AirportAdministrationTampa]

## TPA Delay Stats 2022 (Domestic Flights Only)

- 74% departed on-time
  - Average delay time 70 minutes (among delays)
- 71% arrived on-time
  - Average delay time 64 minutes (among delays)
- 3.5% cancelled

Source: [@RITABTSTranstats]

## TPA Sustainability Efforts

- 42% of planes run on alternative fuels including CNG, electric and hybrid
- Hosts 15 EV charging stations for public
- Gives preferential parking to people with alternative fuel vehicles
- Use reclaimed water for landscape irrigation and cooling towers
- Reduced electricity consumption by 10% per passenger since 2011
- Plan for extending efforts over next several years

Source: [@OurSustainabilityProgram]
